Player History
Had 7 hits with 2 RBI against Philadelphia on 5/10/1965...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 4/8/1966 to a 1-year deal worth $548,000 per year...
Injured on 8/16/1966 with a Broken Foot, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 5/9/1967 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Released by Minnesota on 4/23/1968...
Drafted in 5th round, 99th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1971...
Injured on 8/13/1972 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 6/7/1975 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/18/1975 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/11/1975, off Bob L. Miller (NYM)...
Traded from San Francisco to Philadelphia on 5/5/1976 (Going to SF: RF G. Foster. Going to PHI: LF J. Royster, LF H. Washington, 2B G. Pryor)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/31/1977, off Charlie Hudson (LA)...
